content: don t you just love spending warm summer days drifting lazily across a lake on a giant inflatable flamingo now you can carry some of that summer warmth with you every day of the year by attaching this cute little flamingo floatie to your keychain or backpack or make him into a christmas ornament this crochet pattern pdf has been tested and includes 15 pages of pictures and detailed instructions to make your very own mini flamingo floatie amigurumi instructions are also included to turn your flamingo floatie into a cute keychain or a christmas ornament the basic pattern is also available as an ad-supported free pattern on my blog this premium pdf version is ad-free easily printable and features additional photo tutorials to complete your doll visit my blog post for more information 1 **skill level** beginner **finished dimensions** approx 2 5 wide x 3 5 tall **supplies needed** * dk weight/#3 yarn paintbox yarns simply dk or similar pink light pink black * if making christmas ornament * dk weight/#3 yarn paintbox yarns simply dk or similar red white * a length of red ribbon or yarn for the hanger * size c / 2 75 crochet hook * two 6mm googly eyes * fiberfill stuffing * yarn needle * scissors * stitch marker * optional keychain supplies * keychain - i purchased mine on amazon they have a 1 split key ring a short chain and an open jump ring * pliers **terms & abbreviations** * mc magic_ring * chain chain * sl slip_stitch * single_crochet single_crochet * increase increase * decrease decrease - i recommend using the invisible decrease * if making christmas ornament * double_crochet double_crochet * bobble stitch instructions in pattern 1 https //waywardpineapplecreations com/free-pattern-mini-flamingo-floatie-amigurumi/
